articles.title: World Cup final: How Argentina won penalty shootout
articles.description: A soccer match lasts for 90 minutes, another 30 if there really needs to be a winner. But if it's still level after that, then the game will be decided with a penalty shootout, arguably the most nerve-shredding experience in all of sports.
articles.content:
CNN —
A soccer match lasts for 90 minutes, another 30 if there really needs to be a winner. But if it’s still level after that, then the game will be decided with a penalty shootout, arguably the most nerve-shredding experience in all of sports.

articles.title: South America steps up efforts to turn lithium into batteries
articles.description: Argentina, Chile, Bolivia and Brazil plan to co-ordinate action on turning more of the region’s mined lithium into battery chemicals, as well as moving into manufacturing of batteries and EVs.
articles.content: The so-called lithium triangle of Argentina, Chile and Bolivia accounts for more than half of global lithium resources, and both Brazil and Argentina have auto-making experience. That could be the basis of a regional electro-mobility platform, she sa... [2219 chars]

articles.title: Argentina men, New Zealand women win at Vancouver Sevens
articles.description: VANCOUVER (AP) — The New Zealand women’s team has assured itself of a place at the 2024 Paris Olympics after beating Australia 19-12 on Sunday in the ...
articles.content:
VANCOUVER (AP) — The New Zealand women’s team has assured itself of a place at the 2024 Paris Olympics after beating Australia 19-12 on Sunday in the final of the Vancouver stop on the World Rugby Sevens Series.

articles.title: Home favorite Jarry beats Etcheverry for Chile Open title
articles.description: SANTIAGO, Chile (AP) — Home crowd favorite Nicolas Jarry beat Argentina’s Tomas Martin Etcheverry 6-7 (5), 7-6 (5), 6-2 to clinch the Chile Open final...
articles.content:
SANTIAGO, Chile (AP) — Home crowd favorite Nicolas Jarry beat Argentina’s Tomas Martin Etcheverry 6-7 (5), 7-6 (5), 6-2 to clinch the Chile Open final on Sunday, his first title at the elite level since 2019.

articles.title: Lionel Messi Treated His Teammates To 35 24-Carat Gold iPhone 14 Pro Units For Winning The 2022 FIFA World Cup
articles.description: Football legend Lionel Messi gifted his teammates customized gold iPhone 14 Pro models for helping Argentina win the 2022 FIFA World Cup
articles.content: Winning the 2022 FIFA World Cup in Qatar would likely have been an indescribable feeling for football icon Lionel Messi and his teammates when Argentina beat France in a nail-biting finish. However, as memorable as it is to win a World Cup, it is als... [1731 chars]

articles.title: Lionel Messi just one away from historic 800 career goals
articles.description: Messi has now scored 799 goals in his career with PSG, Barcelona, and the Argentina national team.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi is just one goal away from becoming only the second player ever after Cristiano Ronaldo to reach the 800-goal milestone.
The PSG star scored his 799 goal on Saturday against Nantes. On Thursday, he will have the chance to achieve the his... [1102 chars]

articles.title: Soccer-Messi's boyhood club Newell's Old Boys display banner in support after threats
articles.description: Lionel Messi's boyhood club Newell's Old Boys of Argentina put up a banner of support for their country's captain in their stadium on Saturday, following the attack against his wife Antonela Roccuzzo's family business.

articles.title: Sir Alex Ferguson chat with Man Utd star Lisandro Martinez detailed after World Cup win
articles.description: Lisandro Martinez helped Argentina to win the World Cup in December and he received a special congratulatory message from former Manchester United boss Sir Alex Ferguson
articles.content:
Sir Alex Ferguson spoke personally with Lisandro Martinez to congratulate him on winning the World Cup with Argentina, the Manchester United defender has confirmed.
